help.text: The input is a text file with comma separated values, a .csv file. The supported formats are "decimal . and separator ," or "decimal , and separator ;". The first column becomes the input values, the output column can be selected. The input value vector has to be strictly increasing, if this is not the case, it will be automatically sorted. Duplicate values in the input data vector are not allowed. One blank (empty) line must be present at the end of the data file.
